1.imgAltText: Post Meridian Radio Players digital program preview image
1.caption: In order to conserve paper and money the Post Meridian Radio Players began using web programs for shows. The program site is still under active development and a planned feature is to dynamically render content based on show data entered through a Google form.

2.caption: As part of a class on User Interface design the capstone project was designing a multi-state mockup of a long scroll landing page for a fictional business based on a given design brief.
